title: Get Session Token Request
description: Exchange short-living one-time token received from the brand for a session token that is valid for a long time and can be used multiple times.

get_session_token.description: The one-time token from the brand

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
